The sons of Eshek, his brother, were Ulam, his firstborn, Jeush, the second son, and Eliphelet, the third.
“Return home and recount what God has done for you.” The man went off and proclaimed throughout the whole town what Jesus had done for him. Jairus’s Daughter and the Woman with a Hemorrhage.
They answered and said to him, “Our father is Abraham.” Jesus said to them, “If you were Abraham’s children, you would be doing the works of Abraham.
When they came out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord snatched Philip away, and the eunuch saw him no more, but continued on his way rejoicing.
nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature will be able to separate us from the love of God in Christ Jesus our Lord.
